Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph

Interface NodeHolder<N extends BlockNode>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of node this holder is holding.
public interface NodeHolder<N extends BlockNode>
Positioned holder for a block node.

All block nodes are associated with a block-position and are wrapped in a block-node-holder that stores the position information along with information about what graph the block node is a part of.

    • getNodeEntity

      @Nullable default <E extends NodeEntity> E getNodeEntity(Class<E> entityClass)
      Gets the node entity associated with this block node and casts it to the given type, if possible.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of node entity to try and get.
      Parameters:
      entityClass - the class of the node entity to try and get.
      Returns:
      the node entity associated with this block node, or null if this block node's graph does not exist, if this block node has no associated node entity, or if this block node's associated node entity is of a different class.

    • canCast

      boolean canCast(Class<?> newType)
      Checks whether the contained node can be cast to the new type.

      Tool to get around Java's broken type-variance system.

      Parameters:
      newType - the type the internal node is to be cast to.
      Returns:
      true if the internal node is of the correct type to be cast.

    • cast

      <R extends BlockNode> NodeHolder<R> cast(Class<R> newType) throws ClassCastException
      Casts the internal node to the given type.

      Tool to get around Java's broken type-variance system.

      Type Parameters:
      R - the type the internal node is to be cast to.
      Parameters:
      newType - the type the internal node is to be cast to.
      Returns:
      a node-holder containing the new type.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if the cast failed.
